mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square "and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Hot Line", "ASDW Bulletin", "A History of Square Dancing", "Vox Saltator", "Youth on the Square", "Smoother Dancing Poster", "Take a Good Look - Walk and Dodge", "Roundance Module", "Paging the Round Dancers: Charlie and Marge Carter", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Square Dance Diary", "Callers Text - Chapter Twenty-Three", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab - Sashay Thru", "National Square Dance Convention", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "1973 Square Dancers Guide", "Caller of the Month: Jim Robertson", "On the Record: Reviews", and "Square Dance Date Book".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
